EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Chuck, Great, after you get back I will walk you through how to enter it all in our system. Safe travels!Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Chuck Kosta [mailto:admin@entitynetwork.net] Sent: Friday, February 22, 2013 9:28 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Your MBO account is now active Thanks Sara. Big deliverable and trip to Vermont this weekend! From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> To: "chuck@entitynetwork.net <mailto:chuck@entitynetwork.net>" <chuck@entitynetwork.net <mailto:chuck@entitynetwork.net>> Sent: Thursday, February 21, 2013 2:02 PM Subject: RE: Your MBO account is now activeHi Chuck, Welcome to MBO Partners! Here are some important reminders to be aware of: - Here are some time and expense entry instructions <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_Time_and_Expense_Entry_Instructions.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeFlMtkxW7vKNK730kTDUbZe6sPJzDOOMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> for using our system. - Here is a copy of our expense policy <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Expense_Policy.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeFlMtkxW7vKNK730kTDUbZe6sPJzDOOMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. - Here is a list of the most common expenses <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Expense_List.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeFlMtkxW7vKNK730kTDUbZe6sPJzDOOMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> you can submit to MBO. - All the benefits of MBO Partners Referral Program <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/referral-program?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeFlMtkxW7vKNK730kTDUbZe6sPJzDOOMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. The next step is to schedule another time <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeFlMtkxW7vKNK730kTDUbZe6sPJzDOOMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> that works for you so we can do a walk-through of the business center and I can show you all the great features. I look forward to working with you! Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeFlMtkxW7vKNK730kTDUbZe6sPJzDOOMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeFlMtkxW7vKNK730kTDUbZe6sPJzDOOMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
